subject: I'm a subject
title: Marcus Aurelius
description: A reflection on the life and wisdom of Marcus Aurelius.
content: Marcus Aurelius, one of the most notable Stoic philosophers, left behind a treasure trove of wisdom that resonates even today. As Roman Emperor, he not only ruled with a sense of duty but also lived according to Stoic principles, which he documented in his meditations. His reflections continue to inspire those seeking to live with virtue and integrity.
quotes: "You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength." - Marcus Aurelius
reflection: Through his meditations, Marcus teaches us that peace comes from within, and we should not be disturbed by external events. His life is a testament to practicing what he preached—living according to nature, accepting what happens, and acting with virtue.
author: Ethan Breitkreutz
